ygData.subject: Re: Jaxan's and meditation
ygData.msgSnippet: A druid friend and I did the same test with the same results you had, about a week ago.  At BEST it possibly saved 15 seconds from empty to full (3 mins, 45
ygData.messageBody:
A druid friend and I did the same test with the same results you had, about
a week ago. At BEST it possibly saved 15 seconds from empty to full (3
mins, 45 seconds is usual med time from empty to full), but I suspect she
wasn't completely empty.

> From: Jim Mattson <jmattson@...>

> To put the question to rest, we timed her mana regeneration with and
without
> Jaxan's. It turns out that whether I was singing Jaxan's, the Hymn of
> Restoration, or nothing at all, her meditation time was 45 seconds a
bubble,
> plus or minus 2 seconds, due to the inaccuracies in our measurements.
